00027 #include <Inventor/fields/SoFieldContainer.h>

00029 class SoAction;
00030 class SoCallbackAction;
00031 class SoChildList;
00032 class SoGLRenderAction;
00033 class SoGetBoundingBoxAction;
00034 class SoGetMatrixAction;
00035 class SoGetPrimitiveCountAction;
00036 class SoHandleEventAction;
00037 class SoNodeList;
00038 class SoNotList;
00039 class SoOutput;
00040 class SoPickAction;
00041 class SoRayPickAction;
00042 class SoSearchAction;
00043 class SoWriteAction;
00044 class SoAudioRenderAction;
00045 class SbDict;
00046 
00047 class COIN_DLL_API SoNode : public SoFieldContainer {
00048   typedef SoFieldContainer inherited;
00049 
00050 public:
00051   // Probably not interesting for the application programmer..?
00052 #ifndef DOXYGEN_SKIP_THIS
00053   enum Stage { FIRST_INSTANCE, PROTO_INSTANCE, OTHER_INSTANCE };
00054 #endif // !DOXYGEN_SKIP_THIS
00055 
00056   void setOverride(const SbBool state);
00057   SbBool isOverride(void) const;
00058 
00059   enum NodeType {
00060     INVENTOR     = 0x0000,
00061     VRML1        = 0x0001,
00062     VRML2        = 0x0002,
00063     INVENTOR_1   = 0x0004,
00064     INVENTOR_2_0 = 0x0008,
00065     INVENTOR_2_1 = 0x0010,
00066     INVENTOR_2_5 = 0x0020,
00067     INVENTOR_2_6 = 0x0040,
00068     COIN_1_0     = 0x0080,
00069     COIN_2_0     = 0x0100,
00070     EXTENSION    = 0x0200,
00071     COIN_2_2     = 0x0400,
00072     COIN_2_3     = 0x0800,
00073     COIN_2_4     = 0x1000
00074   };
00075 
00076   static uint32_t getCompatibilityTypes(const SoType & nodetype);
00077   void setNodeType(const NodeType type);
00078   NodeType getNodeType(void) const;
00079 
00080   virtual SoNode * copy(SbBool copyconnections = FALSE) const;
00081   virtual SbBool affectsState(void) const;
00082 
00083   virtual void doAction(SoAction * action);
00084   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00085   virtual void GLRenderBelowPath(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00086   virtual void GLRenderInPath(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00087   virtual void GLRenderOffPath(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00088   virtual void callback(SoCallbackAction * action);
00089   virtual void getBoundingBox(SoGetBoundingBoxAction * action);
00090   virtual void getMatrix(SoGetMatrixAction * action);
00091   virtual void handleEvent(SoHandleEventAction * action);
00092   virtual void pick(SoPickAction * action);
00093   virtual void rayPick(SoRayPickAction * action);
00094   virtual void search(SoSearchAction * action);
00095   virtual void write(SoWriteAction * action);
00096   virtual void audioRender(SoAudioRenderAction * action);
00097   virtual void getPrimitiveCount(SoGetPrimitiveCountAction * action);
00098 
00099   virtual void grabEventsSetup(void);
00100   virtual void grabEventsCleanup(void);
00101 
00102   virtual void startNotify(void);
00103   virtual void notify(SoNotList * l);
00104 
00105   uint32_t getNodeId(void) const;
00106   virtual SoChildList * getChildren(void) const;
00107 
00108   virtual void writeInstance(SoOutput * out);
00109   virtual SoNode * addToCopyDict(void) const;
00110   virtual void copyContents(const SoFieldContainer * from,
00111                             SbBool copyconnections);
00112   virtual SoFieldContainer * copyThroughConnection(void) const;
00113 
00114 
00115   static SoType getClassTypeId(void);
00116   static SoNode * getByName(const SbName & name);
00117   static int getByName(const SbName & name, SoNodeList & l);
00118 
00119   static void initClass(void);
00120   static void initClasses(void);
00121 
00122   static uint32_t getNextNodeId(void);
00123   static int getActionMethodIndex(const SoType type);
00124 
00125   static void getBoundingBoxS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00126   static void GLRenderS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00127   static void callbackS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00128   static void getMatrixS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00129   static void handleEventS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00130   static void pickS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00131   static void rayPickS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00132   static void searchS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00133   static void writeS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00134   static void audioRenderS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00135   static void getPrimitiveCountS(SoAction * action, SoNode * node);
00136 
00137 protected:
00138   SoNode(void);
00139   virtual ~SoNode();
00140 
00141   virtual SbBool readInstance(SoInput * in, unsigned short flags);
00142 
00143   static const SoFieldData ** getFieldDataPtr(void);
00144 
00145   // These are necessary to avoid problems with us not exporting the
00146   // nextActionMethodIndex member into Win32 DLLs (we'll get
00147   // unresolved symbol for extension node classes if the SoSubNode
00148   // macros accesses the nextActionMethodIndex directly).
00149   static void setNextActionMethodIndex(int index);
00150   static int getNextActionMethodIndex(void);
00151   static void incNextActionMethodIndex(void);
00152 
00153   static void setCompatibilityTypes(const SoType & nodetype, const uint32_t bitmask);
00154 
00155   uint32_t uniqueId;
00156   static uint32_t nextUniqueId;
00157   static int nextActionMethodIndex;
00158 
00159 private:
00160   static SoType classTypeId;
00161   uint32_t stateflags;
00162   void clearStateFlags(const unsigned int bits);
00163   void setStateFlags(const unsigned int bits);
00164   SbBool getState(const unsigned int bits) const;
00165   static SbDict * compatibilitydict;
00166   static void cleanupClass(void);
00167 };
